Name: Bulbasaur
Part 1: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokemon is born. The seed slowly grows larger.
Part 2: While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.
Description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pokemon is born. The seed slowly grows larger. While it is young, it uses the nutrients that are stored in the seed on its back in order to grow.

Name: Ivysaur
Part 1: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.
Part 2: Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.
Description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs. Exposure to sunlight adds to its strength. Sunlight also makes the bud on its back grow larger.

Name: Venusaur
Part 1: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.
Part 2: A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.
Description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight. A bewitching aroma wafts from its flower. The fragrance becalms those engaged in a battle.

Name: Charmander
Part 1: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
Part 2: From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.
Description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail. From the time it is born, a flame burns at the tip of its tail. Its life would end if the flame were to go out.

Name: Charmeleon
Part 1: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.
Part 2: If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.
Description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws. If it becomes agitated during battle, it spouts intense flames, incinerating its surroundings.

Name: Charizard
Part 1: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.
Part 2: Its wings can carry this Pokemon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.
Description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames. Its wings can carry this Pokemon close to an altitude of 4,600 feet. It blows out fire at very high temperatures.

Name: Squirtle
Part 1: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.
Part 2: When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.
Description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force. When it feels threatened, it draws its limbs inside its shell and sprays water from its mouth.

Name: Wartortle
Part 1: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.
Part 2: It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.
Description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old. It cleverly controls its furry ears and tail to maintain its balance while swimming.

Name: Blastoise
Part 1: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell.
Part 2: The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.
Description: It crushes its foe under its heavy body to cause fainting. In a pinch, it will withdraw inside its shell. The rocket cannons on its shell fire jets of water capable of punching holes through thick steel.

Name: Caterpie
Part 1: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
Part 2: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.
Description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies. Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

Name: Metapod
Part 1: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack.
Part 2: Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It cant withstand a harsh attack.
Description: It is waiting for the moment to evolve. At this stage, it can only harden, so it remains motionless to avoid attack. Even though it is encased in a sturdy shell, the body inside is tender. It cant withstand a harsh attack.

Name: Butterfree
Part 1: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.
Part 2: It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.
Description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air. It collects honey every day. It rubs honey onto the hairs on its legs to carry it back to its nest.

Name: Weedle
Part 1: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves.
Description: Beware of the sharp stinger on its head. It hides in grass and bushes where it eats leaves. .

Name: Kakuna
Part 1: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy.
Description: Able to move only slightly. When endangered, it may stick out its stinger and poison its enemy. .

Name: Beedrill
Part 1: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.
Description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly. .

Name: Pidgey
Part 1: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back.
Description: Very docile. If attacked, it will often kick up sand to protect itself rather than fight back. .

Name: Pidgeotto
Part 1: This Pokemon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.
Description: This Pokemon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey. .

Name: Pidgeot
Part 1: This Pokemon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.
Description: This Pokemon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons. .

Name: Rattata
Part 1: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area.
Description: Will chew on anything with its fangs. If you see one, you can be certain that 40 more live in the area. .

Name: Raticate
Part 1: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.
Description: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey. .

Name: Spearow
Part 1: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.
Description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory. .

Name: Fearow
Part 1: A Pokemon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly.
Description: A Pokemon that dates back many years. If it senses danger, it flies high and away, instantly. .

Name: Ekans
Part 1: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest.
Description: The older it gets, the longer it grows. At night, it wraps its long body around tree branches to rest. .

Name: Arbok
Part 1: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.
Description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed. .

Name: Pikachu
Part 1: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy.
Part 2: When Pikachu meet, theyll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.
Description: Pikachu that can generate powerful electricity have cheek sacs that are extra soft and super stretchy. When Pikachu meet, theyll touch their tails together and exchange electricity through them as a form of greeting.

Name: Raichu
Part 1: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.
Part 2: If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.
Description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power. If its electric pouches run empty, it raises its tail to gather electricity from the atmosphere.

Name: Sandshrew
Part 1: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokemon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body.
Part 2: It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.
Description: It loves to bathe in the grit of dry, sandy areas. By sand bathing, the Pokemon rids itself of dirt and moisture clinging to its body. It burrows into the ground to create its nest. If hard stones impede its tunneling, it uses its sharp claws to shatter them and then carries on digging.

Name: Sandslash
Part 1: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokemons spikes will feel when touched.
Part 2: It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.
Description: The drier the area Sandslash lives in, the harder and smoother the Pokemons spikes will feel when touched. It climbs trees by hooking on with its sharp claws. Sandslash shares the berries it gathers, dropping them down to Sandshrew waiting below the tree.

Name: Nidoran-F
Part 1: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, theyll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators.
Part 2: It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidorans horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a males horn.
Description: Females are more sensitive to smells than males. While foraging, theyll use their whiskers to check wind direction and stay downwind of predators. It uses its hard incisor teeth to crush and eat berries. The tip of a female Nidorans horn is a bit more rounded than the tip of a males horn.

Name: Nidorina
Part 1: The horn on its head has atrophied. Its thought that this happens so Nidorinas children wont get poked while their mother is feeding them.
Part 2: If the group is threatened, these Pokemon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.
Description: The horn on its head has atrophied. Its thought that this happens so Nidorinas children wont get poked while their mother is feeding them. If the group is threatened, these Pokemon will band together to assault enemies with a chorus of ultrasonic waves.

Name: Nidoqueen
Part 1: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokemon will shield its children from any kind of attack.
Part 2: It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.
Description: Nidoqueen is better at defense than offense. With scales like armor, this Pokemon will shield its children from any kind of attack. It pacifies offspring by placing them in the gaps between the spines on its back. The spines will never secrete poison while young are present.

Name: Nidoran-M
Part 1: The horn on a male Nidorans forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokemon, always straining its large ears.
Part 2: Small but brave, this Pokemon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female its friendly with.
Description: The horn on a male Nidorans forehead contains a powerful poison. This is a very cautious Pokemon, always straining its large ears. Small but brave, this Pokemon will hold its ground and even risk its life in battle to protect the female its friendly with.

Name: Nidorino
Part 1: With a horn thats harder than diamond, this Pokemon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone.
Part 2: Its nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.
Description: With a horn thats harder than diamond, this Pokemon goes around shattering boulders as it searches for a moon stone. Its nervous and quick to act aggressively. The potency of its poison increases along with the level of adrenaline present in its body.

Name: Nidoking
Part 1: When it goes on a rampage, its impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen its lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down.
Part 2: Nidoking prides itself on its strength. Its forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.
Description: When it goes on a rampage, its impossible to control. But in the presence of a Nidoqueen its lived with for a long time, Nidoking calms down. Nidoking prides itself on its strength. Its forceful and spirited in battle, making use of its thick tail and diamond-crushing horn.

Name: Clefairy
Part 1: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon.
Part 2: Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokemon is rarely found.
Description: It is said that happiness will come to those who see a gathering of Clefairy dancing under a full moon. Its adorable behavior and cry make it highly popular. However, this cute Pokemon is rarely found.

Name: Clefable
Part 1: A timid fairy Pokemon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people.
Part 2: Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so theyre usually found in quiet places.
Description: A timid fairy Pokemon that is rarely seen, it will run and hide the moment it senses people. Their ears are sensitive enough to hear a pin drop from over a mile away, so theyre usually found in quiet places.

Name: Vulpix
Part 1: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.
Part 2: As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.
Description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted. As each tail grows, its fur becomes more lustrous. When held, it feels slightly warm.

Name: Ninetales
Part 1: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers.
Part 2: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.
Description: It is said to live 1,000 years, and each of its tails is loaded with supernatural powers. Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1,000-year curse.

Name: Jigglypuff
Part 1: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokemon. It wont stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep.
Part 2: By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.
Description: Jigglypuff has top-notch lung capacity, even by comparison to other Pokemon. It wont stop singing its lullabies until its foes fall asleep. By freely changing the wavelength of its voice, Jigglypuff sings a mysterious melody sure to make any listener sleepy.

Name: Wigglytuff
Part 1: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them.
Part 2: Its proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture thats perfectly heavenly.
Description: The more air it takes in, the more it inflates. If opponents catch it in a bad mood, it will inflate itself to an enormous size to intimidate them. Its proud of its fur, which is fine and delicate. In particular, the curl on its forehead has a texture thats perfectly heavenly.

Name: Zubat
Part 1: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill.
Part 2: Zubat live in caves, down where the suns light wont reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.
Description: It emits ultrasonic waves from its mouth to check its surroundings. Even in tight caves, Zubat flies around with skill. Zubat live in caves, down where the suns light wont reach. In the morning, they gather together to keep each other warm as they sleep.

Name: Golbat
Part 1: It loves to drink other creatures blood. Its said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood its gathered.
Part 2: Its feet are tiny, but this Pokemon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.
Description: It loves to drink other creatures blood. Its said that if it finds others of its kind going hungry, it sometimes shares the blood its gathered. Its feet are tiny, but this Pokemon walks skillfully. It sneaks up on sleeping prey before sinking in its fangs and slurping up blood.

Name: Oddish
Part 1: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds.
Part 2: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.
Description: If exposed to moonlight, it starts to move. It roams far and wide at night to scatter its seeds. During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

Name: Gloom
Part 1: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles.
Part 2: What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.
Description: Its pistils exude an incredibly foul odor. The horrid stench can cause fainting at a distance of 1.25 miles. What appears to be drool is actually sweet honey. It is very sticky and clings stubbornly if touched.

Name: Vileplume
Part 1: It has the worlds largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.
Part 2: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.
Description: It has the worlds largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen. The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

Name: Paras
Part 1: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition.
Description: Burrows under the ground to gnaw on tree roots. The mushrooms on its back absorb most of the nutrition. .

Name: Parasect
Part 1: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking.
Description: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushroom on its back. The mushroom appears to do all the thinking. .

Name: Venonat
Part 1: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes.
Description: Its large eyes act as radar. In a bright place, you can see that they are clusters of many tiny eyes. .

Name: Venomoth
Part 1: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.
Description: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact. .

Name: Diglett
Part 1: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops.
Part 2: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.
Description: If a Diglett digs through a field, it leaves the soil perfectly tilled and ideal for planting crops. It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It leaves raised earth in its wake, making it easy to spot.

Name: Dugtrio
Part 1: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.
Part 2: These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what its like underground.
Description: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground. These Diglett triplets dig over 60 miles below sea level. No one knows what its like underground.

Name: Meowth
Part 1: It loves to collect shiny things. If its in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures.
Part 2: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesnt get along with Galarian Meowth.
Description: It loves to collect shiny things. If its in a good mood, it might even let its Trainer have a look at its hoard of treasures. It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesnt get along with Galarian Meowth.

Name: Persian
Part 1: Getting this prideful Pokemon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed.
Part 2: Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.
Description: Getting this prideful Pokemon to warm up to you takes a lot of effort, and it will claw at you the moment it gets annoyed. Its elegant and refined behavior clashes with that of the barbaric Perrserker. The relationship between the two is one of mutual disdain.

Name: Psyduck
Part 1: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokemon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while.
Part 2: As Psyduck gets stressed out, its headache gets progressively worse. It uses intense psychic energy to overwhelm those around it.
Description: Psyduck is constantly beset by headaches. If the Pokemon lets its strange power erupt, apparently the pain subsides for a while. As Psyduck gets stressed out, its headache gets progressively worse. It uses intense psychic energy to overwhelm those around it.

Name: Golduck
Part 1: This Pokemon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display.
Part 2: Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into the water and taken away.
Description: This Pokemon lives in gently flowing rivers. It paddles through the water with its long limbs, putting its graceful swimming skills on display. Old tales tell of Golduck punishing those that defiled its river. The guilty were dragged into the water and taken away.

Name: Mankey
Part 1: An agile Pokemon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything.
Description: An agile Pokemon that lives in trees. It angers easily and will not hesitate to attack anything. .

Name: Primeape
Part 1: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult.
Description: It stops being angry only when nobody else is around. To view this moment is very difficult. .

Name: Growlithe
Part 1: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes.
Part 2: Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.
Description: It has a brave and trustworthy nature. It fearlessly stands up to bigger and stronger foes. Extremely loyal, it will fearlessly bark at any opponent to protect its own Trainer from harm.

Name: Arcanine
Part 1: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people.
Part 2: A Pokemon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.
Description: The sight of it running over 6,200 miles in a single day and night has captivated many people. A Pokemon that has long been admired for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

Name: Poliwag
Part 1: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokemons innards showing through the skin.
Part 2: In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokemon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.
Description: For Poliwag, swimming is easier than walking. The swirl pattern on its belly is actually part of the Pokemons innards showing through the skin. In rivers with fast-flowing water, this Pokemon will cling to a rock by using its thick lips, which act like a suction cup.

Name: Poliwhirl
Part 1: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirls has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep.
Part 2: This Pokemons sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies grasp and escape.
Description: Staring at the swirl on its belly causes drowsiness. This trait of Poliwhirls has been used in place of lullabies to get children to go to sleep. This Pokemons sweat is a slimy mucus. When captured, Poliwhirl can slither from its enemies grasp and escape.

Name: Poliwrath
Part 1: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward.
Part 2: Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.
Description: Its body is solid muscle. When swimming through cold seas, Poliwrath uses its impressive arms to smash through drift ice and plow forward. Poliwrath is skilled at both swimming and martial arts. It uses its well-trained arms to dish out powerful punches.

Name: Abra
Part 1: This Pokemon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abras dreams affect the powers that the Pokemon wields.
Part 2: Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its teleportations go.
Description: This Pokemon uses its psychic powers while it sleeps. The contents of Abras dreams affect the powers that the Pokemon wields. Abra can teleport in its sleep. Apparently the more deeply Abra sleeps, the farther its teleportations go.

Name: Kadabra
Part 1: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow.
Part 2: This Pokemons telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.
Description: Using its psychic power, Kadabra levitates as it sleeps. It uses its springy tail as a pillow. This Pokemons telekinesis is immensely powerful. To prepare for evolution, Kadabra stores up psychic energy in the star on its forehead.

Name: Alakazam
Part 1: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death.
Part 2: Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. Its said that this Pokemon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.
Description: It has an incredibly high level of intelligence. Some say that Alakazam remembers everything that ever happens to it, from birth till death. Alakazam wields potent psychic powers. Its said that this Pokemon used these powers to create the spoons it holds.

Name: Machop
Part 1: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though its the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups.
Part 2: Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.
Description: Its whole body is composed of muscles. Even though its the size of a human child, it can hurl 100 grown-ups. Always brimming with power, it passes time by lifting boulders. Doing so makes it even stronger.

Name: Machoke
Part 1: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.
Part 2: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.
Description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions. Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

Name: Machamp
Part 1: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.
Part 2: With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.
Description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles. With four arms that react more quickly than it can think, it can execute many punches at once.

Name: Bellsprout
Part 1: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them.
Description: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny bugs with its vines and devours them. .

Name: Weepinbell
Part 1: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids.
Description: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is dissolved by strong acids. .

Name: Victreebel
Part 1: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all.
Description: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is dissolved in a day, bones and all. .

Name: Tentacool
Part 1: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey.
Part 2: This Pokemon is mostly made of water. A Tentacool out in the ocean is very hard to spot, because its body blends in with the sea.
Description: Tentacool is not a particularly strong swimmer. It drifts across the surface of shallow seas as it searches for prey. This Pokemon is mostly made of water. A Tentacool out in the ocean is very hard to spot, because its body blends in with the sea.

Name: Tentacruel
Part 1: When the red orbs on Tentacruels head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokemon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves.
Part 2: Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely. Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch .
Description: When the red orbs on Tentacruels head glow brightly, watch out. The Pokemon is about to fire off a burst of ultrasonic waves. Its 80 tentacles can stretch and shrink freely. Tentacruel ensnares prey in a net of spread-out tentacles, delivering venomous stings to its catch .

Name: Geodude
Part 1: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry.
Description: Commonly found near mountain trails and the like. If you step on one by accident, it gets angry. .

Name: Graveler
Part 1: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid.
Description: Often seen rolling down mountain trails. Obstacles are just things to roll straight over, not avoid. .

Name: Golem
Part 1: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when its exposed to air.
Description: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when its exposed to air. .

Name: Ponyta
Part 1: It cant run properly when its newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger.
Part 2: If youve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.
Description: It cant run properly when its newly born. As it races around with others of its kind, its legs grow stronger. If youve been accepted by Ponyta, its burning mane is mysteriously no longer hot to the touch.

Name: Rapidash
Part 1: This Pokemon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind.
Part 2: The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herds pace and direction of travel.
Description: This Pokemon can be seen galloping through fields at speeds of up to 150 mph, its fiery mane fluttering in the wind. The fastest runner becomes the leader, and it decides the herds pace and direction of travel.

Name: Slowpoke
Part 1: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokemon wont feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It wont notice when its tail grows back, either.
Part 2: When this Pokemons tail is soaked in water, sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait to lure in and fish up other Pokemon.
Description: Slow-witted and oblivious, this Pokemon wont feel any pain if its tail gets eaten. It wont notice when its tail grows back, either. When this Pokemons tail is soaked in water, sweetness seeps from it. Slowpoke uses this trait to lure in and fish up other Pokemon.

Name: Slowbro
Part 1: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream.
Part 2: Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokemon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.
Description: Slowpoke became Slowbro when a Shellder bit on to its tail. Sweet flavors seeping from the tail make the Shellder feel as if its life is a dream. Being bitten by a Shellder shocked this Pokemon into standing on two legs. If the Shellder lets go, it seems Slowbro will turn back into a Slowpoke.

Name: Magnemite
Part 1: At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, itll start moving again.
Part 2: It subsists on electricity. As Magnemite flies, it emits electromagnetic waves from the units on each side of its body.
Description: At times, Magnemite runs out of electricity and ends up on the ground. If you give batteries to a grounded Magnemite, itll start moving again. It subsists on electricity. As Magnemite flies, it emits electromagnetic waves from the units on each side of its body.

Name: Magneton
Part 1: This Pokemon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings.
Part 2: This Pokemon is constantly putting out a powerful magnetic force. Most computers go haywire when a Magneton approaches.
Description: This Pokemon is three Magnemite that have linked together. Magneton sends out powerful radio waves to study its surroundings. This Pokemon is constantly putting out a powerful magnetic force. Most computers go haywire when a Magneton approaches.

Name: Farfetchd
Part 1: The stalk this Pokemon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food.
Part 2: They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.
Description: The stalk this Pokemon carries in its wings serves as a sword to cut down opponents. In a dire situation, the stalk can also serve as food. They use a plant stalk as a weapon, but not all of them use it in the same way. Several distinct styles of stalk fighting have been observed.

Name: Doduo
Part 1: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokemon runs at high speed on developed legs.
Description: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokemon runs at high speed on developed legs. .

Name: Dodrio
Part 1: One of Doduos two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies.
Description: One of Doduos two heads splits to form a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph in prairies. .

Name: Seel
Part 1: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit .
Description: Loves freezing-cold conditions. Relishes swimming in a frigid climate of around 14 degrees Fahrenheit . .

Name: Dewgong
Part 1: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters.
Description: Its entire body is a snowy white. Unharmed by even intense cold, it swims powerfully in icy waters. .

Name: Grimer
Part 1: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds wont grow in its path.
Description: Made of congealed sludge. It smells too putrid to touch. Even weeds wont grow in its path. .

Name: Muk
Part 1: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.
Description: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell. .

Name: Shellder
Part 1: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast.
Part 2: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.
Description: It swims facing backward by opening and closing its two-piece shell. It is surprisingly fast. Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

Name: Cloyster
Part 1: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking.
Part 2: Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.
Description: Its shell is extremely hard. It cannot be shattered, even with a bomb. The shell opens only when it is attacking. Once it slams its shell shut, it is impossible to open, even by those with superior strength.

Name: Gastly
Part 1: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison.
Part 2: With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.
Description: Born from gases, anyone would faint if engulfed by its gaseous body, which contains poison. With its gas-like body, it can sneak into any place it desires. However, it can be blown away by wind.

Name: Haunter
Part 1: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes.
Part 2: If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.
Description: Its tongue is made of gas. If licked, its victim starts shaking constantly until death eventually comes. If you get the feeling of being watched in darkness when nobody is around, Haunter is there.

Name: Gengar
Part 1: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengars doing.
Part 2: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.
Description: On the night of a full moon, if shadows move on their own and laugh, it must be Gengars doing. It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

Name: Onix
Part 1: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid.
Part 2: It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.
Description: As it digs through the ground, it absorbs many hard objects. This is what makes its body so solid. It rapidly bores through the ground at 50 mph by squirming and twisting its massive, rugged body.

Name: Drowzee
Part 1: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past.
Description: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it had eaten in the past. .

Name: Hypno
Part 1: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
Part 2: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.
Description: Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum. Avoid eye contact if you come across one. It will try to put you to sleep by using its pendulum.

Name: Krabby
Part 1: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.
Part 2: If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger .
Description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets. If it senses danger approaching, it cloaks itself with bubbles from its mouth so it will look bigger .

Name: Kingler
Part 1: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.
Part 2: Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when its not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.
Description: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move. Its oversized claw is very powerful, but when its not in battle, the claw just gets in the way.

Name: Voltorb
Part 1: It is said to camouflage itself as a Poke Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus.
Description: It is said to camouflage itself as a Poke Ball. It will self-destruct with very little stimulus. .

Name: Electrode
Part 1: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.
Description: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion. .

Name: Exeggcute
Part 1: Though it may look like its just a bunch of eggs, its a proper Pokemon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently.
Part 2: These Pokemon get nervous when theyre not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.
Description: Though it may look like its just a bunch of eggs, its a proper Pokemon. Exeggcute communicates with others of its kind via telepathy, apparently. These Pokemon get nervous when theyre not in a group of six. The minute even one member of the group goes missing, Exeggcute become cowardly.

Name: Exeggutor
Part 1: Each of Exeggutors three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three dont seem to be very interested in one another.
Part 2: When they work together, Exeggutors three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokemon sluggish.
Description: Each of Exeggutors three heads is thinking different thoughts. The three dont seem to be very interested in one another. When they work together, Exeggutors three heads can put out powerful psychic energy. Cloudy days make this Pokemon sluggish.

Name: Cubone
Part 1: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head.
Part 2: This Pokemon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubones dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.
Description: When the memory of its departed mother brings it to tears, its cries echo mournfully within the skull it wears on its head. This Pokemon wears the skull of its deceased mother. Sometimes Cubones dreams make it cry, but each tear Cubone sheds makes it stronger.

Name: Marowak
Part 1: This Pokemon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon.
Part 2: When this Pokemon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowaks temperament also turned vicious at the same time.
Description: This Pokemon overcame its sorrow to evolve a sturdy new body. Marowak faces its opponents bravely, using a bone as a weapon. When this Pokemon evolved, the skull of its mother fused to it. Marowaks temperament also turned vicious at the same time.

Name: Hitmonlee
Part 1: This amazing Pokemon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position.
Part 2: The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.
Description: This amazing Pokemon has an awesome sense of balance. It can kick in succession from any position. The legs freely contract and stretch. The stretchy legs allow it to hit a distant foe with a rising kick.

Name: Hitmonchan
Part 1: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn.
Part 2: Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.
Description: Its punches slice the air. They are launched at such high speed, even a slight graze could cause a burn. Its punches slice the air. However, it seems to need a short break after fighting for three minutes.

Name: Lickitung
Part 1: If this Pokemons sticky saliva gets on you and you dont clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch wont go away, either.
Part 2: Bug Pokemon are Lickitungs main food source. This Pokemon paralyzes its prey with a lick from its long tongue, then swallows the prey whole.
Description: If this Pokemons sticky saliva gets on you and you dont clean it off, an intense itch will set in. The itch wont go away, either. Bug Pokemon are Lickitungs main food source. This Pokemon paralyzes its prey with a lick from its long tongue, then swallows the prey whole.

Name: Koffing
Part 1: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash.
Part 2: It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.
Description: Its body is full of poisonous gas. It floats into garbage dumps, seeking out the fumes of raw, rotting trash. It adores polluted air. Some claim that Koffing used to be more plentiful in the Galar region than they are now.

Name: Weezing
Part 1: It mixes gases between its two bodies. Its said that these Pokemon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.
Part 2: It cant suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.
Description: It mixes gases between its two bodies. Its said that these Pokemon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day. It cant suck in air quite as well as a Galarian Weezing, but the toxins it creates are more potent than those of its counterpart.

Name: Rhyhorn
Part 1: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokemon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles.
Part 2: It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.
Description: Strong, but not too bright, this Pokemon can shatter even a skyscraper with its charging tackles. It can remember only one thing at a time. Once it starts rushing, it forgets why it started.

Name: Rhydon
Part 1: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn.
Part 2: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.
Description: It begins walking on its hind legs after evolution. It can punch holes through boulders with its horn. Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Chansey
Part 1: The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious but also packed with nutrition. Its used as a high-class cooking ingredient.
Part 2: This species was once very slow. To protect their eggs from other creatures, these Pokemon became able to flee quickly.
Description: The egg Chansey carries is not only delicious but also packed with nutrition. Its used as a high-class cooking ingredient. This species was once very slow. To protect their eggs from other creatures, these Pokemon became able to flee quickly.

Name: Tangela
Part 1: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokemons true appearance remains a mystery.
Part 2: The vines of a Tangela have a distinct scent. In some parts of Galar, Tangela vines are used as herbs.
Description: Hidden beneath a tangle of vines that grows nonstop even if the vines are torn off, this Pokemons true appearance remains a mystery. The vines of a Tangela have a distinct scent. In some parts of Galar, Tangela vines are used as herbs.

Name: Kangaskhan
Part 1: Although its carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs.
Part 2: There are records of a lost human child being raised by a childless Kangaskhan.
Description: Although its carrying its baby in a pouch on its belly, Kangaskhan is swift on its feet. It intimidates its opponents with quick jabs. There are records of a lost human child being raised by a childless Kangaskhan.

Name: Horsea
Part 1: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokemon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes.
Part 2: They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.
Description: Horsea makes its home in oceans with gentle currents. If this Pokemon is under attack, it spits out pitch-black ink and escapes. They swim with dance-like motions and cause whirlpools to form. Horsea compete to see which of them can generate the biggest whirlpool.

Name: Seadra
Part 1: Its the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison.
Part 2: Seadras mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food thats larger than the opening of its mouth.
Description: Its the males that raise the offspring. While Seadra are raising young, the spines on their backs secrete thicker and stronger poison. Seadras mouth is slender, but its suction power is strong. In an instant, Seadra can suck in food thats larger than the opening of its mouth.

Name: Goldeen
Part 1: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer.
Part 2: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.
Description: Its dorsal, pectoral, and tail fins wave elegantly in water. That is why it is known as the Water Dancer. Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

Name: Seaking
Part 1: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors.
Part 2: Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.
Description: In autumn, its body becomes more fatty in preparing to propose to a mate. It takes on beautiful colors. Using its horn, it bores holes in riverbed boulders, making nests to prevent its eggs from washing away.

Name: Staryu
Part 1: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, youll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm.
Part 2: Fish Pokemon nibble at it, but Staryu isnt bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.
Description: If you visit a beach at the end of summer, youll be able to see groups of Staryu lighting up in a steady rhythm. Fish Pokemon nibble at it, but Staryu isnt bothered. Its body regenerates quickly, even if part of it is completely torn off.

Name: Starmie
Part 1: This Pokemon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers.
Part 2: Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokemon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.
Description: This Pokemon has an organ known as its core. The organ glows in seven colors when Starmie is unleashing its potent psychic powers. Starmie swims by spinning its body at high speed. As this Pokemon cruises through the ocean, it absorbs tiny plankton.

Name: Mr-Mime
Part 1: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence?many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming.
Part 2: Its known for its top-notch pantomime skills. It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.
Description: The broadness of its hands may be no coincidence?many scientists believe its palms became enlarged specifically for pantomiming. Its known for its top-notch pantomime skills. It protects itself from all sorts of attacks by emitting auras from its fingers to create walls.

Name: Scyther
Part 1: As Scyther fights more and more battles, its scythes become sharper and sharper. With a single slice, Scyther can fell a massive tree.
Part 2: If you come across an area in a forest where a lot of the trees have been cut down, what youve found is a Scythers territory.
Description: As Scyther fights more and more battles, its scythes become sharper and sharper. With a single slice, Scyther can fell a massive tree. If you come across an area in a forest where a lot of the trees have been cut down, what youve found is a Scythers territory.

Name: Jynx
Part 1: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice.
Part 2: The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokemon have even gathered a fan base.
Description: In certain parts of Galar, Jynx was once feared and worshiped as the Queen of Ice. The Jynx of Galar often have beautiful and delicate voices. Some of these Pokemon have even gathered a fan base.

Name: Electabuzz
Part 1: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokemon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity.
Part 2: With the coming of a storm, many of these Pokemon will gather under tall trees and sit there waiting for lightning to strike.
Description: Many power plants keep Ground-type Pokemon around as a defense against Electabuzz that come seeking electricity. With the coming of a storm, many of these Pokemon will gather under tall trees and sit there waiting for lightning to strike.

Name: Magmar
Part 1: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp.
Part 2: These Pokemons bodies are constantly burning. Magmar are feared as one of the causes behind fires.
Description: Magmar dispatches its prey with fire. But it regrets this habit once it realizes that it has burned its intended prey to a charred crisp. These Pokemons bodies are constantly burning. Magmar are feared as one of the causes behind fires.

Name: Pinsir
Part 1: These Pokemon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender.
Part 2: This Pokemon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.
Description: These Pokemon judge one another based on pincers. Thicker, more impressive pincers make for more popularity with the opposite gender. This Pokemon clamps its pincers down on its prey and then either splits the prey in half or flings it away.

Name: Tauros
Part 1: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, its a warning that the Pokemon is about to charge with astounding speed.
Part 2: The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in nature, and they wont allow people to ride on their backs.
Description: When Tauros begins whipping itself with its tails, its a warning that the Pokemon is about to charge with astounding speed. The Tauros of the Galar region are volatile in nature, and they wont allow people to ride on their backs.

Name: Magikarp
Part 1: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokemon in the world.
Part 2: This weak and pathetic Pokemon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.
Description: It is virtually worthless in terms of both power and speed. It is the most weak and pathetic Pokemon in the world. This weak and pathetic Pokemon gets easily pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

Name: Gyarados
Part 1: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets.
Part 2: Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.
Description: It has an extremely aggressive nature. The Hyper Beam it shoots from its mouth totally incinerates all targets. Once it begins to rampage, a Gyarados will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

Name: Lapras
Part 1: A smart and kindhearted Pokemon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it.
Part 2: Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokemon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.
Description: A smart and kindhearted Pokemon, it glides across the surface of the sea while its beautiful song echoes around it. Crossing icy seas is no issue for this cold-resistant Pokemon. Its smooth skin is a little cool to the touch.

Name: Ditto
Part 1: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.
Part 2: When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.
Description: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes. When it encounters another Ditto, it will move faster than normal to duplicate that opponent exactly.

Name: Eevee
Part 1: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment.
Part 2: Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokemon conceals many different possible evolutions.
Description: It has the ability to alter the composition of its body to suit its surrounding environment. Thanks to its unstable genetic makeup, this special Pokemon conceals many different possible evolutions.

Name: Vaporeon
Part 1: When Vaporeons fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours.
Part 2: Its bodys cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.
Description: When Vaporeons fins begin to vibrate, it is a sign that rain will come within a few hours. Its bodys cellular structure is similar to the molecular composition of water. It can melt invisibly in water.

Name: Jolteon
Part 1: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes.
Part 2: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.
Description: If it is angered or startled, the fur all over its body bristles like sharp needles that pierce foes. It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

Name: Flareon
Part 1: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokemons body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit.
Part 2: It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.
Description: Once it has stored up enough heat, this Pokemons body temperature can reach up to 1,700 degrees Fahrenheit. It stores some of the air it inhales in its internal flame pouch, which heats it to over 3,000 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: Porygon
Part 1: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokemon to be created via computer programming.
Part 2: In recent years, this species has been very helpful in cyberspace. These Pokemon will go around checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.
Description: State-of-the-art technology was used to create Porygon. It was the first artificial Pokemon to be created via computer programming. In recent years, this species has been very helpful in cyberspace. These Pokemon will go around checking to make sure no suspicious data exists.

Name: Omanyte
Part 1: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem.
Part 2: This Pokemon is a member of an ancient, extinct species. Omanyte paddles through water with its 10 tentacles, looking like its just drifting along.
Description: Because some Omanyte manage to escape after being restored or are released into the wild by people, this species is becoming a problem. This Pokemon is a member of an ancient, extinct species. Omanyte paddles through water with its 10 tentacles, looking like its just drifting along.

Name: Omastar
Part 1: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldnt move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food.
Part 2: Omastars sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokemon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.
Description: Weighed down by a large and heavy shell, Omastar couldnt move very fast. Some say it went extinct because it was unable to catch food. Omastars sharp fangs could crush rock, but the Pokemon can attack only the prey that come within reach of its tentacles.

Name: Kabuto
Part 1: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder.
Part 2: While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.
Description: This species is almost entirely extinct. Kabuto molt every three days, making their shells harder and harder. While some say this species has gone extinct, Kabuto sightings are apparently fairly common in some places.

Name: Kabutops
Part 1: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokemon.
Part 2: The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokemon that inhabited warm seas.
Description: Kabutops slices its prey apart and sucks out the fluids. The discarded body parts become food for other Pokemon. The cause behind the extinction of this species is unknown. Kabutops were aggressive Pokemon that inhabited warm seas.

Name: Aerodactyl
Part 1: This is a ferocious Pokemon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen.
Part 2: Aerodactyls sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters?even the skin of Steel-type Pokemon.
Description: This is a ferocious Pokemon from ancient times. Apparently even modern technology is incapable of producing a perfectly restored specimen. Aerodactyls sawlike fangs can shred skin to tatters?even the skin of Steel-type Pokemon.

Name: Snorlax
Part 1: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep.
Part 2: This Pokemons stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.
Description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. When it is done eating, it goes promptly to sleep. This Pokemons stomach is so strong, even eating moldy or rotten food will not affect it.

Name: Articuno
Part 1: Its said that this Pokemons beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it.
Part 2: This Pokemon can control ice at will. Articuno is said to live in snowy mountains riddled with permafrost.
Description: Its said that this Pokemons beautiful blue wings are made of ice. Articuno flies over snowy mountains, its long tail fluttering along behind it. This Pokemon can control ice at will. Articuno is said to live in snowy mountains riddled with permafrost.

Name: Zapdos
Part 1: This Pokemon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds.
Part 2: Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokemon. Its said that when Zapdos rubs its feathers together, lightning will fall immediately after.
Description: This Pokemon has complete control over electricity. There are tales of Zapdos nesting in the dark depths of pitch-black thunderclouds. Zapdos is a legendary bird Pokemon. Its said that when Zapdos rubs its feathers together, lightning will fall immediately after.

Name: Moltres
Part 1: Its one of the legendary bird Pokemon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow.
Part 2: There are stories of this Pokemon using its radiant, flame-cloaked wings to light up paths for those lost in the mountains.
Description: Its one of the legendary bird Pokemon. When Moltres flaps its flaming wings, they glimmer with a dazzling red glow. There are stories of this Pokemon using its radiant, flame-cloaked wings to light up paths for those lost in the mountains.

Name: Dratini
Part 1: Dratini dwells near bodies of rapidly flowing water, such as the plunge pools of waterfalls. As it grows, Dratini will shed its skin many times.
Part 2: This Pokemon was long considered to be no more than a myth. The small lump on a Dratinis forehead is actually a horn thats still coming in.
Description: Dratini dwells near bodies of rapidly flowing water, such as the plunge pools of waterfalls. As it grows, Dratini will shed its skin many times. This Pokemon was long considered to be no more than a myth. The small lump on a Dratinis forehead is actually a horn thats still coming in.

Name: Dragonair
Part 1: This Pokemon lives in pristine oceans and lakes. It can control the weather, and it uses this power to fly into the sky, riding on the wind.
Part 2: This Pokemon gathers power in the orbs on its tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.
Description: This Pokemon lives in pristine oceans and lakes. It can control the weather, and it uses this power to fly into the sky, riding on the wind. This Pokemon gathers power in the orbs on its tail and controls the weather. When enshrouded by an aura, Dragonair has a mystical appearance.

Name: Dragonite
Part 1: Its a kindhearted Pokemon. If it spots a drowning person or Pokemon, Dragonite simply must help them.
Part 2: This Pokemon is known as the Sea Incarnate. Figureheads that resemble Dragonite decorate the bows of many ships.
